niagara.logical.predicates
Class Predicate

java.lang.Object
  niagara.logical.predicates.Predicate
All Implemented Interfaces:
condition
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryPredicate, Comparison, False, Not, True
public abstract class Predicate
extends java.lang.Object
implements condition

A generic predicate. Predicate objects are immutable.

 And split(Attrs variables)

splitEquiJoin

public Predicate splitEquiJoin(Attrs leftAttrs,
                               Attrs rightAttrs)
Split this predicate into a conjunction of two predicates: a conjunction of equality comparisons between attributes from leftAttrs and rightAttrs (that can be used in a hash-based join), and another with no such restrictions
